Control Name: Protects Mobile Devices—Processes are in place to protect mobile devices (such as laptops, smart phones and tablets) that serve as information assets.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Mobile Devices—Processes are in place to protect mobile devices (such as laptops, smart phones and tablets) that serve as information assets.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.7 The entity restricts the transmission, movement, and removal of information to authorized internal and external users and processes, and protects it during transmission, movement, or removal to meet the entity’s objectives.
